example.en: It seems that you massively over-saturate it with light.
example.cn: 看来你用光把它过度饱和了。

example.en: Do not over-saturate the image with light.
example.cn: 不要用光使图像过度饱和。

example.en: Please review whether you can reduce the light in your test.
example.cn: 请检查您是否可以在测试中减少光线。

example.en: Can you reduce the light by an order of magnitude?
example.cn: 你能把光线减少一个数量级吗？
